revised_title: Experiments on the Repulsion Produced by Different Rays of the Solar Spectrum
tldr: The author conducted experiments using a torsion balance to study the repulsion produced by different rays of the solar spectrum. They discovered that the mechanical action of radiation is a function of both luminous rays and dark heat-rays. The author also developed a sensitive balance to weigh the force of radiation from a candle and examined the action of radiation on various materials like alum, rock-salt, and glass.
